mapper.insert: insert into guestbook (id, blogId, displayId, writer, contents, dateCreated) values(#{id}, #{blog.id}, #{displayId}, #{writer}, #{contents}, #{dateCreated})
mapper.update: update guestbook set contents = #{contents} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from guestbook where blogId = #{blogId} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.sql: SELECT g.id as id, g.blogId as "blog.id", g.displayId as displayId, g.writer as writer, g.contents as contents, g.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM guestbook g
